metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6978 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
The GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) 2.2.5 has a double free in the gdImage*Ptr() functions in gd_gif_out.c, gd_jpeg.c, and gd_wbmp.c. NOTE: PHP is unaffected.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6978` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.2.5-5.1
libgd3 - 2.2.5-5.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-5.1').
